channel.title: Optimism Grants Council
channel.description: Recent content on Optimism Grants Council

item.title: Our Mission
item.description:
Our Mission

The Optimism Grants Council exists to accelerate the growth and adoption of the Optimism ecosystem by strategically allocating grants to high-impact projects and initiatives.

item.title: How We Operate
item.description:
How We Operate

The Optimism Grants Council operates through a structured process designed to ensure fair, transparent, and impactful grant allocation.

item.title: Season 7
item.description:
Season 7: Retrospective

Season 7 of the Optimism Grants Council has concluded. Submissions closed on July 15th, 2024.

Season 7 Highlights

  • Total Grants Awarded: 47
  • Total Funding Distributed: $2.8M
  • Applications Received: 312
  • Success Rate: 15%

Key Focus Areas

Season 7 prioritized:

item.title: Season 8
item.description:
Season 8: Building the Future

Season 8 of the Optimism Grants Council will open for applications on August 20th, 2024. This season focuses on accelerating growth and innovation across the Optimism ecosystem.
